author: Nintendo of America
description:
Red Dead Redemption is available now for Nintendo Switch 2: https://nintendo.com/us/store/products/red-dead-redemption-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01 

This epic Western adventure features free upgrades and the ability to carry over game progress for anyone who owns the original Nintendo Switch version, plus a number of enhancements taking full advantage of Nintendo Switch 2 features. 

#NintendoSwitch2 #RedDeadRedemption 

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

title: Red Dead Redemption – Launch Trailer – Nintendo Switch 2
